newProps.token would be the thing being requested, so it won't need to trigger a new request. It is possible that the API token is deleted on the server, and would need re-requested, but there isn't anyway for this component to tell if that is the case.
Having a componentWillReceiveProps that just calls request is probably a good idea though.
